dmca.title: [ABUSE] abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 10, 2006 8:46 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] abuse

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, February 09,
2006 at
7:38:26 PM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] abuse

MESSAGE BODY:
It has come to my attention that the website bassgirls.com, run by one
Francis Kennedy, is hosted on your servers.

This website contains copyright material belonging to myself as well as
personal information about myself which I do not wish to be disclosed on the
internet.  I have contacted Mr. Kennedy on numerous occasions requesting
that this material be taken down and he has plainly refused to do so.

I am currently in the process of seeking legal council to remedy this
problem, however I would like to resolve the matter in the quickest and most
efficient manner possible. I therefore request that you contact Mr. Kennedy
and have him remove the offending material.

Specifically the page involved is:
http://bassgirls.com/bass_griffinivy.htm

including the personal information listed on the page.

The copyrighted material is the following photograph being used against my
wishes:
http://bassgirls.com/images/bass_griffinivy01.jpg

Please contact me at your earliest convenience to inform me as to how you
are planning to resolve the matter.

Thank you in advance for your assistance,

Ivana Vujic
vujicivana@gmail.com


RFC822 HEADERS:
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1F7NF0-0005GL-1V; Thu, 09 Feb 2006 19:38:30 -0600

        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1F7NEy-0005G7-AD
